docs.text: water-sample-schema Sample LinkML project setup for 2024 paper figures URI: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/water-sample-schema Name: water-sample-schema Classes Class Description BioSampleCollection A holder for BioSample objects NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity BioSample A hypothetical collection of attributes that represent a sample of water from a specific location and depth with associated bacterial composition. Slots Slot Description bacteria The bacteria, represented by a NCBITaxon identifier, present in a sample depth The depth of the water sample in centimeters entries id A unique identifier for a thing latitude The latitude of the water sample longitude The longitude of the water sample sample_type The type of sample Enumerations Enumeration Description SampleTypeEnum The type of sample Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description

docs.text: Class: BioSample A hypothetical collection of attributes that represent a sample of water from a specific location and depth with associated bacterial composition. URI: water_sample_schema:BioSample classDiagram class BioSample NamedThing <|-- BioSample BioSample : bacteria BioSample : depth BioSample : id BioSample : latitude BioSample : longitude BioSample : sample_type Inheritance NamedThing BioSample Slots Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance depth 0..1 Float The depth of the water sample in centimeters direct sample_type 0..1 Uriorcurie The type of sample direct latitude 0..1 Float The latitude of the water sample direct longitude 0..1 Float The longitude of the water sample direct bacteria 0..* Uriorcurie The bacteria, represented by a NCBITaxon identifier, present in a sample direct id 1..1 Uriorcurie A unique identifier for a thing NamedThing Usages used by used in type used BioSampleCollection entries range BioSample Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/water-sample-schema Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self water_sample_schema:BioSample native water_sample_schema:BioSample LinkML Source Direct name: BioSample description: A hypothetical collection of attributes that represent a sample of water from a specific location and depth with associated bacterial composition. from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/water-sample-schema is_a: NamedThing slots: - BioSample range: float sample_type: name: sample_type description: The type of sample from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/water-sample-schema rank: 1000 slot_uri: water_sample_schema:sample_type alias: sample_type owner: BioSample domain_of: -
